name: WiiU or 3DS Texture File
summary: Learn about .JTEX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Some WiiU and 3DS video games use the .JARC archive format to store game assets. JARC archives contain in-game model, texture, and animation files. Together, these files are used to show and animate game characters, locations, and items.

JTEX files are in-game texture files, which contain an image or images that are layered atop an in-game model (.JMDL file) to "skin" it. For example, the files used to add color, textures, shadows, and depth to One Piece: Super Grand Battle! X's characters are saved as JTEX files.

description: A JTEX file is a texture used by a Nintendo WiiU or 3DS video game. It contains a "skin" that is applied to an in-game character, item, or location. JTEX files are most notably used in Wii Fit U, Dragon Ball Fusions, and One Piece: Super Grand Battle! X.

instructions: While player-created extraction and import utilities exist for some specific JTEX files, most JTEX files cannot be opened outside the game they are used in.
